thread.title: Great location, great service, great rooms
thread.title_full: Great location, great service, great rooms - Review of Hotel Vernet, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Kathy M
title: Great location, great service, great rooms
text:
Beautiful old hotel, situated right near Arc de Triomphe. Staff at front counter can't do enough for you, Angelo has been amazing helping us with information and directions to places. Restaurant fantastic too with the most beautiful glass ceiling.
Room Tip: Ask for balcony. See more room tips
